reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's feminine style and pretty color, with one noting it looks more expensive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brighter than expected but overall great sweater
items.body: The color in the product photo makes it look like the sweater is a deep, muted teal which is what I was wanting. However, the sweater is a very bold and vivid shade of teal. The knit pattern does provide some detail of interest and the loose openness of that pattern allows for breathability. I find it to be nice for the spring and fall days when the mornings are cool but the afternoons warm up and you want to feel the breeze pass through. The fit is easy and true to size. Read more
items.author: Kangaroo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and stylish
items.body: Very stylish. Super comfy. Goes well with leggings or jeans can be dressed up or down. Not super warm as the knit design is not a close knit. This sweater will shrink if you put it in the dryer with heat, but if your dryer has a no heat, air tumble dry option that will work the same as flat drying and won’t shrink the sweater. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft with a nice knit design, but very little stretch at the bottom hem!
items.body: This sweater is really cute - the cable and lace pattern is really nice - and it's soft. However, there's very little stretch at the bottom hem, which makes it too tight around the hips, so it rides up. (I can barely get it over my arms and shoulders when putting it on.) I'm obsessed with sweaters - I have far, far too many! - and have never had this issue with a lack of stretch. The olive green isn't quite as dark as pictured in the image, but it's not quite yellowish like another reviewer described it. It's nice enough to keep. Read more
items.author: K. O'Connor

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like the picture but bad quality
items.body: Loved the style, color and material but we tried it on to style it and it already looks like it's unstitching. Read more
items.author: Claudia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality pullover with quality material (knit)
items.body: Love this pullover, I chose a burnt red color which looks fabulous and bought one size down from my regular size. Fits wonderfully with just the right amount of room. Not too loose and not too tight. Material is quality and it looks great on. Looks very much like the picture. Glad that I bought this. Read more
items.author: Brit

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable lightweight sweater
items.body: It’s the perfect pullover sweater and it’s lightweight. I love the deep orange color! I wear a size small, so I ordered a small, and it fits me well. Read more
items.author: Lisa B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!
items.body: This is a must have sweater! So cute! I ordered a medium and it fits perfect (5’3140 lbs). I’m going to order more colors. It is lightweigh and you can either wear something underneath it or not. Read more
items.author: CKS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy, color not true
items.body: Khaki did not look like it does online. Very warm, golden color. Material is very soft, hangs nicely. If you wear a flesh-colored bra beneath it, the bra isn't noticeable. But, if you wore a colored bra the color of the bra would show through the loose knit design. It's a soft loose fit. I wear an XL usually, bought it in XL though Amazon advised a 2XL; the neckline was a bit large on my shoulders and wanted to drop off one side or the other. It doesn't seem to wrinkle. It might be great over a slim-fitting tank top. I'd like to try another color maybe in the spring. It seems like a good weight for fall & spring, or over a tank on a chilly night in summer. Read more
items.author: Diane N Fillion

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki 2, Brown, Gray, Blue, Z1 Apricot, Rose, Black, Z1 Navy Blue, Dusty Blue, Orange, Red, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
